title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repository: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama, providing simple synchronous and asynchronous APIs to chat with local models.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, installable via npm and usable in Node or browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: PyPI package integrating Ollama models into LangChain for chaining, tool use, retrieval, and agents.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (now renamed 'Open WebUI') offering ChatGPT-like interface, model management, and RAG.

title: ollama-hack
summary: Community-curated list of example scripts, tools, and hacks built around Ollama’s local LLM server.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced interactive CLI wrapper for Ollama with conversation history, syntax highlighting, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental GitHub Copilot-style code-completion plugin powered by Ollama local models.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that lets servers chat with Ollama models through slash commands.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot integration for Ollama enabling teams to query local LLMs directly from Slack channels.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app template that connects to Ollama and demonstrates streaming conversation UI.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal retrieval-augmented-generation example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package providing JavaScript/TypeScript bindings for the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Community-maintained Docker Compose stacks for running Ollama + WebUI with GPU passthrough.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with optional WebUI and GPU node selectors.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial Rust crate providing typed async bindings to the Ollama HTTP API.

title: ollama-go
summary: Community Go client library for Ollama covering chat, generate, pull, and embed endpoints.

title: ollama-models
summary: Registry of community-modified GGUF models fine-tuned and packaged specifically for Ollama.

title: ollama-reddit-discussion
summary: Reddit thread discussing the new native tool-calling capability added in Ollama v0.1.38.

title: ollama-hackernews
summary: Hacker News discussion on Ollama’s open-source approach to running Llama-3 and other models locally.
